    B

    ButtonEditor - Class in Unnamed Package

    ButtonRenderer - Class in Unnamed Package
    A custom table cell renderer that displays edit This renderer ensures that each cell in the specified column is displayed as a button
    ButtonRenderer() - Constructor for class ButtonRenderer
    Constructs a ButtonRenderer and initializes the button

    I

    InventoryScreen - Class in Unnamed Package
    The InventoryScreen class represents the manager's view for managing inventory and generating sales reports in the database This GUI allows the manager to view, add, delete, and update inventory items, as well as generate sales reports based on date ranges
    InventoryScreen(Connection) - Constructor for class InventoryScreen
    Constructs the InventoryScreen with database connectivity

    L

    LoginScreen - Class in Unnamed Package
    LoginScreen class represents a user interface for employee/manager login This allows users to log in with their Employee ID and password It determines if the employee is a Cashier or Manager and directs them accordingly

    Constructs a LoginScreen object
